metadata.name: Heart of Stone
metadata.description:
This is the beginning of the journey. Collect the hearts if you're worthy, and carry them through, or burn them on the way for something new. 
It's your heart, your call. 
Can you close the gap? Is it enough? Can you turn this into a Heart of Gold?  
We'll see. 


[This NFT is part of a special series that will allow you to be eligible for future drops and burns, treat it carefully]  


.  
The night is young,  
the words won't come,  
the day is old,  
the words won't come

I've lost my soul,  
the words won't come,  
I've lost my heart,  
the words won't come.

Please, I'm begging,  
teach me how  
to love again
